title: sAdhanam sei sei
sahitya:
sAdhanam sei sei manamE sadA bhakti jnAna karma


anupallavi

  Adip-paramporuLai Alum tiruvaruLai aghanAyakanai sukhadAyakanai ninaindE


caraNam    cittat-tiragaLai dhyAnattilnAl aDakki sIrum kAmAdip-pEyin cETTaigaLai oDukki
shuddha samarasa sanmArga jyOtiyil sutantarAnandamAm padam tarum sama yOga
